import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function AddUser() { const [user,setUser]=useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"" }) const{name,username,email}=user const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setUser({...user,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) }; const onSubmit=(e)=>{ } return
